title: A briefe discourse of the late murther of master George Saunders, a worshipfull citizen of London and of the apprehension, arreignement, and execution of the principall and accessaries of the same.
author: Golding, Arthur, 1536-1606.
publicationStmtPublisher: By Henry Bynneman, dvvelling in Knightriders streete, at the signe of the Mermayde,
